p: We measured the endpoints using routine data extracted from the participants’ clinical records. We developed standard operating procedures for data management for transferring participant paper files to a trial‐specific electronic database. Nurse mentors regularly reviewed the participant files for accuracy and completeness, and provided mentorship to the clinic staff. The data manager and trial statistician generated monthly error reports for data clerks and nurse mentors to resolve in the clinics. In addition, the data manager conducted a quarterly quality assessment by reviewing 10% of paper records with electronic data entry.
